fields.name: ***Elimination!***:
fields.value: Choose two players who placed below you in the previous Evening phase to face off in a duel. This will consist of a simple challenge, like trivia or a puzzle. The winner of this duel is given an additional x0.5 to their Defense for the night, and the loser is hit with your Attack Power.

fields.name: ***Immunity Idol!*** *(x1, Charge 120%)*:
fields.value: Hide an immunity idol within the town. The player who finds this will be granted a x10.0 multiplier to their Defense the following night.

fields.name: **Double Eviction!** *(Passive, Locked)*:
fields.value: This ability is unlocked when you win a round. The following day, the town has the ability to hammer twice.
